data.text: “Luonguru oweteu ni ‘Joga,’ kendo luonguru nyimineu ni ‘Joma ahero.’ ”
“Kwer minu, kwere,
Ka ok kamano to abiro lonye duk
Ok anaher nyithinde,
Min-gi ok osebedo ja-ratiro
Omiyo anagengʼ yore kod bungu maduongʼ mar kudho;
Enolaw bangʼ jochodenego to ok nomakgi;
Ok osengʼeyo adier ni an
“Kuom mano abiro kawo chamba ka osechiek,
Koro abiro nyiso ayanga gombo mare mar chode
Nyasi duto ma en-go anakethi:
Anaketh yiendene mag mzabibu gi yiend ngʼopene
Jehova Nyasaye wacho niya,
“Kuom mano abiro hoye,
Kanyo abiro dwokone puothe mar mzabibu,
Jehova Nyasaye owacho niya,
Abiro golo nyinge mag Baal oa e dhoge.
Chiengʼno anaketnegi singruok
Abiro timo kodi singruok mar kend mondo ibed mara chuth;
Abiro timo kodi singruok mar kend e yo mar adiera,
Jehova Nyasaye wacho niya,
kendo cham biro nyak e piny,
Abiro pidhe e piny ne an awuon;
